name: We Go Alone
description:
Isometric Puzzle Platformer, wired 360 controller needed.

Use Right + Left bumpers to travel up or down a layer where they overlap. Black outlined layers are below, white outlined layers are above.
Hold X or Y to charge attacks. X attacks knock enemies back, Y attacks pull them closer to you.
Hit certain platforms to move them. Either attack will work, platforms will move between two fixed locations.
Hold Start to view controls in full during the game. Press select to view Notebook.
